metadata.title: CVE-2017-6814 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In WordPress before 4.7.3, there is authenticated Cross-Site Scripting(XSS) via Media File Metadata. This is demonstrated by both (1) mishandlingof the playlist shortcode in the wp_playlist_shortcode function inwp-includes/media.php and (2) mishandling of meta information in therenderTracks function in wp-includes/js/mediaelement/wp-playlist.js.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
